verses.verse: Moreover, <S%G1161><s%> brethren, <S%G80><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that ye <S%G5209><s%> should be ignorant, <S%G50><s%> how that <S%G3754><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> fathers <S%G3962><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> cloud, <S%G3507><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> passed <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> sea; <S%G2281><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> did all <S%G3956><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> same <S%G846><s%> spiritual <S%G4152><s%> drink: <S%G4188><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they drank <S%G4095><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> that spiritual <S%G4152><s%> Rock <S%G4073><s%> that followed <S%G190><s%> them: and <S%G1161><s%> that Rock <S%G4073><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> many <S%G4119><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> was not well pleased: <S%G2106><s%> <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they were overthrown <S%G2693><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> were <S%G1096><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> examples, <S%G5179><s%> to the intent we <S%G2248><s%> should not lust after <S%G1511><s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G1938><s%> evil things, <S%G2556><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> they also <S%G2548><s%> lusted. <S%G1937><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> ye idolaters, <S%G1496><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> were some <S%G5100><s%> of them; <S%G846><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> sat down <S%G2523><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drink, <S%G4095><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rose up <S%G450><s%> to play. <S%G3815><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> let us commit fornication, <S%G4203><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> committed, <S%G4203><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fell <S%G4098><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> three and twenty thousand. <S%G5140><s%> <S%G1501><s%> <S%G5505><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> let us tempt <S%G1598><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> tempted, <S%G3985><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were destroyed <S%G622><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> serpents. <S%G3789><s%>

Neither <S%G3366><s%> murmur <S%G1111><s%> ye, as <S%G2531><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> murmured, <S%G1111><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> were destroyed <S%G622><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> destroyer. <S%G3644><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> happened <S%G4819><s%> unto them <S%G1565><s%> for examples: <S%G5179><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> they are written <S%G1125><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> admonition, <S%G3559><s%> upon <S%G1519><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> ends <S%G5056><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G165><s%> are come. <S%G2658><s%>
Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> let him that thinketh <S%G1380><s%> he standeth <S%G2476><s%> take heed <S%G991><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> he fall. <S%G4098><s%>

There hath no <S%G3756><s%> temptation <S%G3986><s%> taken <S%G2983><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> such as is common to man: <S%G442><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> is faithful, <S%G4103><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> will not <S%G3756><s%> suffer <S%G1439><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to be tempted <S%G3985><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> ye are able; <S%G1410><s%> but <S%G235><s%> will with <S%G4862><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> temptation <S%G3986><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> a way to escape, <S%G1545><s%> that ye <S%G5209><s%> may be able <S%G1410><s%> to bear <S%G5297><s%> it.
Wherefore, <S%G1355><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> dearly beloved, <S%G27><s%> flee <S%G5343><s%> from <S%G575><s%> idolatry. <S%G1495><s%>
I speak <S%G3004><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> to wise men; <S%G5429><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I say. <S%G5346><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> cup <S%G4221><s%> of blessing <S%G2129><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we bless, <S%G2127><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> it not <S%G3780><s%> the communion <S%G2842><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> of Christ? <S%G5547><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> bread <S%G740><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we break, <S%G2806><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> it not <S%G3780><s%> the communion <S%G2842><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> body <S%G4983><s%> of Christ? <S%G5547><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> we being many <S%G4183><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and one <S%G1520><s%> body: <S%G4983><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> we are all partakers <S%G3348><s%> <S%G3956><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> that one <S%G1520><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>

Behold <S%G991><s%> Israel <S%G2474><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh: <S%G4561><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> they which eat <S%G2068><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> sacrifices <S%G2378><s%> partakers <S%G2844><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> altar? <S%G2379><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> say <S%G5346><s%> I then? <S%G3767><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the idol <S%G1497><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> any thing, <S%G5100><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G3754><s%> that which is offered in sacrifice to idols <S%G1494><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> any thing? <S%G5100><s%>

But <S%G235><s%> I say, that <S%G3754><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> sacrifice, <S%G2380><s%> they sacrifice <S%G2380><s%> to devils, <S%G1140><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to God: <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> that ye <S%G5209><s%> should have <S%G1096><s%> fellowship <S%G2844><s%> with devils. <S%G1140><s%>

Ye cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> of devils: <S%G1140><s%> ye cannot <S%G1410><s%> <S%G3756><s%> be partakers <S%G3348><s%> of the Lord's <S%G2962><s%> table, <S%G5132><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the table <S%G5132><s%> of devils. <S%G1140><s%>
Do we <S%G2228><s%> provoke the Lord to jealousy? <S%G3863><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> we <S%G3361><s%> stronger <S%G2478><s%> than he? <S%G846><s%>

All things <S%G3956><s%> are lawful <S%G1832><s%> for me, <S%G3427><s%> but <S%G235><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are not expedient: <S%G4851><s%> <S%G3756><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are lawful <S%G1832><s%> for me, <S%G3427><s%> but <S%G235><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> edify <S%G3618><s%> not. <S%G3756><s%>
Let no man <S%G3367><s%> seek <S%G2212><s%> his own, <S%G1438><s%> but <S%G235><s%> every man <S%G1538><s%> another's <S%G2087><s%> wealth.

Whatsoever <S%G3956><s%> is sold <S%G4453><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the meat market, <S%G3111><s%> that eat, <S%G2068><s%> asking no question <S%G350><s%> <S%G3367><s%> for conscience sake: <S%G1223><s%> <S%G4893><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> is the <S%G3588><s%> Lord's, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fullness <S%G4138><s%> thereof. <S%G848><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of them that believe not <S%G571><s%> bid <S%G2564><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> to a feast, and <S%G2532><s%> ye be disposed <S%G2309><s%> to go; <S%G4198><s%> whatsoever <S%G3956><s%> is set before <S%G3908><s%> you, <S%G5213><s%> eat, <S%G2068><s%> asking no question <S%G350><s%> <S%G3367><s%> for conscience sake. <S%G1223><s%> <S%G4893><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> say <S%G2036><s%> unto you, <S%G5213><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> offered in sacrifice unto idols, <S%G1494><s%> eat <S%G2068><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> for his sake <S%G1223><s%> <S%G1565><s%> that showed <S%G3377><s%> it, and <S%G2532><s%> for conscience <S%G4893><s%> sake: for <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%> is the <S%G3588><s%> Lord's, <S%G2962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> fullness <S%G4138><s%> thereof: <S%G848><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Conscience, <S%G4893><s%> I say, <S%G3004><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> thine own, <S%G1438><s%> but <S%G235><s%> of <S%G3588><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> other: <S%G2087><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> why <S%G2444><s%> is my <S%G3450><s%> liberty <S%G1657><s%> judged <S%G2919><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> another <S%G243><s%> man's conscience? <S%G4893><s%>

For <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> by grace <S%G5485><s%> be a partaker, <S%G3348><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> am I evil spoken of <S%G987><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> for which I <S%G1473><s%> give thanks? <S%G2168><s%>

Whether <S%G1535><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> ye eat, <S%G2068><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> drink, <S%G4095><s%> or <S%G1535><s%> whatsoever <S%G5100><s%> ye do, <S%G4160><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> to the <S%G1519><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Give none offense, <S%G1096><s%> <S%G677><s%> neither <S%G2532><s%> to the Jews, <S%G2453><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> to the Gentiles, <S%G1672><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> to the <S%G3588><s%> church <S%G1577><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%>

Even as I <S%G2504><s%> <S%G2531><s%> please <S%G700><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men in all <S%G3956><s%> things, not <S%G3361><s%> seeking <S%G2212><s%> mine own <S%G1683><s%> profit, <S%G4851><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> profit of many, <S%G4183><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they may be saved. <S%G4982><s%>
